title: 94x18: Discussion of "Use of Nonpublic Information" and "Teaching, Speaking and Writing" Sections in the Standards of Ethical Conduct
summary: OGE explains example 5 in the "Use of nonpublic information" section of the Standards of Ethical Conduct, at 5 C.F.R. § 2635.703. Additionally, OGE generally discusses the "teaching, speaking and writing" section of the Standards, at 5 C.F.R. § 2635.807.
